sourcesContent:
List of Students

Student ID CNE CIN Date of Birth Email Actions
{{ student.id }} {{ student.cne }} {{ student.cin }} {{ student.dateNaissance | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }} {{ student.email }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {StudentService} from "../services/student.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-student', templateUrl: './student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student.component.css'] }) export class StudentComponent { handleDeleteStudent(student :any) { if (confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete the student with ID ${student.id}?`)) { // Make a DELETE request to the server to delete the student this.StudentService.deleteStudent(student.id) .subscribe( // On success, remove the student from the students array () => { this.students = this.students.filter(s => s.id !== student.id); }, // On error, display an error message error => { console.error(error); alert('An error occurred while trying to delete the student.'); } ); } } }
